EmailTemplate.name: Customer_Announcement_SupportPhonesDown.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Announcement - Phone Support System Temporarily down
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Customer Annoucement
TriTech Customers:
We are currently experiencing technical difficulties with our phone support system. If you have an issue, please email us at imcsupport@tritech.com <mailto:imcsupport@tritech.com> or use the chat on myimc.com.
If it is after-hours, use the on-call support as normal.
Thank you for your patience as our IT personnel fix this problem.
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor â€“ IMC | Decorah, IA TriTech Software Systems| www.tritech.com
